fractals.description: Use video and audio to create unique and psychedelic video art in your browser!
fractals.title: Psychedelic Video Fractals

kaleidoscope.description: More video and audio to create situational and psychedelic video art in your browser!
kaleidoscope.title: Crunk Kaleidoscope

portal.description: Don't get dizzy! Works best in the dark... or anywhere?
portal.title: Portal

light-trails.description: Create pixels or swirls from the color you choose. A nice ambient piece.
light-trails.title: Pixel Trails
